attributes.action: Ban agreements between universities and Coffee chains (aka costa coffee) so preventing monopoly situations on campus where students and staff are ripped off
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Universities should not be places that replicate the high street - they are here in part to challenge the status quo - hence the decision by many V.C's to gain extra revenue by entering into exclusive deals with retail outlets on the campus is poor practice educationally and ethically. It needs to be stopped
